content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Ah, Mr. Trabelsi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement on the rental price for my apartment. So, what do you think would be a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a good location?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Is there any possibility to negotiate?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Well, Mr. Trabelsi, I understand that you're looking for the best deal possible, but keep in mind that I have to maximize my gains as a landlord. That being said, I'm open to negotiating. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month for the apartment.

Mister Heine, I agree to the price of 400 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Very well, Mr. Trabelsi. I agree to the rental price of 400 Euros per month. Let's move on to the next steps of the rental process.
name: Heinrich Heine
